name: Visio Report Definition File
summary: Learn about .VRD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Visio report definitions can only be opened using the Reporting Tool within Visio. This feature can accessed by selecting Toolsâ†’Report.

description: Defines the parameters of a report created with Microsoft Visio; saved in an XML format; divided into five sections including 1) the title and description, 2) the fields and column headers, 3) information selection filters, 4) record groupings, and 5) a description of how the information is sorted.
